monster-adjustment.Name: Monster Adjustment
monster-adjustment.Hint: Show monster adjustment options in the actor context menu.

actor-find-and-replace.Name: Find and Replace
actor-find-and-replace.Hint: Show find-and-replace option in the actor context menu.

surge-messages.Name: Healing Surge Messages
surge-messages.Hint: Show healing surge changes in chat.

resource-messages.Name: Resource Point Messages
resource-messages.Hint: Show resource point changes in chat.

condition-messages.Name: Condition Messages
condition-messages.Hint: Show conditions at the start of each turn.

append-duration.Name: Append Durations
append-duration.Hint: Append an effect's duration in the condition messages.

actor-import-config.Name: Import Actor Config
actor-import-config.Hint: Show import options in the actor context menu.

condition-messages.Name: Effects Chat Message
condition-messages.Hint: Post temporary effects of the selected tokens to chat.

encounter-difficulty.Name: Encounter Difficulty
encounter-difficulty.Hint: Print encounter difficulty of the selected monsters.

import-cbuilder.title: Import CBuilder File
import-cbuilder.hint1: Choose a CBuilder .dnd4e file and click import.
import-cbuilder.hint2: The import is not perfect. Please check your character, and add bonuses etc. manually.
import-cbuilder.hint3: Does not import homebrew elements, unless present in the compendium.

build-equipment.title: Build Magic Item
build-equipment.hint1: Enter an enchantment and a base item and press 'build'.
build-equipment.hint2: Names must match compendium entries exactly.

adjust-monster.title: Adjust Monster Stats by Level (MM3 Math)
adjust-monster.hint1: Enter a monster name and the desired level, and press 'build'.
adjust-monster.hint2: This fetches a monster from the 4e compendium module, and adjusts its stats.
adjust-monster.hint3: The monster name must match the compendium entry exactly.
